docs.text: plot summary : the year is 2024 .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the ozone layer has long since gone and the earth is now protected from radiation by a shield invented by connor mccleod .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the shield , although saving lives , has made the atmosphere hot and humid .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: connor is a mortal and a tired old man who has given up hope .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on returning from the opera one night connor is accosted by the leader of a " terrorist " organisation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they have tried to find out what the company that now runs the shield unit are covering up .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: connor is then attacked by two assassins sent by katana from the planet zeist ( like zeit--get it ? ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they fail and connor becomes immortal again by chopping their heads off .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he then brings ramirez back to life in glencoe in scotland .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: both ramirez and connor are rebel leaders back on zeist and have been sent to earth as punishment .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: connor now has the option to return being the last one but opts to stay with his new found immortality and fight to find out about the company and the shield .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: katana meanwhile , fearing connor would return , sets out himself to kill the highlander .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you have never seen it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: being a fan of highlander and mr . connery , i was in the cinema as soon as i could to see highlander ii : the quickening .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i wish it had been quicker .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i feel whatever else you can say about a film ( bad script bad music , etc . ) if you sit just plain bored through most of it then nothing much else needs to be said .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film was short but in my opinion only twelve minutes or so ( the time mr . connery is on the screen for ) is worth watching .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot sounds a little ridiculous but i was willing to give it a chance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: maybe they could pull it off .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: instead , i find that the characters have completely changed from those in the first film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's as if they are different people with the same names .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: witness connor jumping into bed with the leader of the resistance -- where is the attitude of " who wants to live forever , when love must die " gone to ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the love sub-plot * must * have had footage cut out .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the highlander and ramirez both seemed aware of powers they had never mentioned before .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: putting our heroes in deadly situations and then having them walk away because of some new power is very annoying .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i still want to know why connor's coat becomes flame proof when he is immortal !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we are not given enough time on zeist to believe in it , nor are we told why advanced aliens still use swords to kill .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why not dynamite or laser saws or just plain bullets followed by a quick chop to the neck ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i know the head needs to come off but you could at least immobilise your opponent with laser rifles first .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to be fair one assassin tried this but he must be the world's worst shot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: meanwhile connor develops luke-skywalker-like powers of laser beam deflection .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as for " bad guys , " we see a rebellion on zeist , crushed easier than a grape and then the rest of the plot depends on katana being obsessed with killing mccleod in case he returns to zeist .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: two assassins are sent , presumably they are meant to be good at killing but an aged connor kills them both with no problems .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: no more assassins are sent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: katana , supposedly a very powerful man goes himself to kill connor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: has he no more assassins ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: has he no better ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why was the rebellion crushed so easily then ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: michael ironside is totally unconvincing ( bring back the kurgan ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he seems like a cartoon character and really isn't that evil , just stupid and violent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we see the hollywood trick of the chief nasty threatening a child again and killing lots of innocents .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yet he still seems like no threat -- perhaps because he seems too stupid to threaten connor , or maybe because his two best assassins wouldn't have been amiss with larry , curly and mo .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so much for plot and characters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the music is atrocious .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is at best intrusive and at worst annoying .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bring back queen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there was an audible sigh ( of relief ? )
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when connor played a queen track in a juke box .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i believe this at least is to be corrected for the american release .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the acting is at best flat , except for mr . connery .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: lambert is uninteresting and when he delivered " there can be only one " this time around it just made me wish there had only been one -- highlander .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: michael ironside is unconvincing ; sorry , michael , i usually like you and everyone else was incredibly forgetable .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so why 2/10 ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: visually the film is interesting at all times .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it has a blade runner feel to it and some of the special effects are quite stunning .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: add to this an irrepressible sean connery who smiles throughout the whole film -- or is he smirking to himself ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his lines and delivery might make the film worthwhile had it not been so obvious that he cannot take the whole thing seriously at all but hey -- * i'd * have done it for 12 million .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oh , and i agree with a previous reviewer , she * does * look like sharon stone but i believe it is her first film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: incidentally there is a line producer credited and i hear rumours of highlander iii : the wizard .
docs.label: negative
